source.sqlReaderQuery: select HW_Date from dbo.HWMTable where Tablename='Customer'
select max(ModifiedDate) as LastRecordDate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.Customer where ModifiedDate>'@{activity('Get Table Date HWM').output.firstRow.HW_Date}' and ModifiedDate<='@{activity('Fetch Date from Table').output.firstRow.LastRecordDate}'
select 'Customer' as Tablename, '@{activity('Fetch Date from Table').output.firstRow.LastRecordDate}' as HW_Date

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT * FROM holiday_calendar WHERE holiday_date = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
select count(*) as RecordCount from saleslt.customer

items.value: @createarray('select * from saleslt.product where productID>100','select * from saleslt.customer where customerID>100 and CustomerID<1000')
